question: There are two pipes A and B that can fill a tank in 10 and 15 hours respectively. If both pipes work together, how long will it take to fill the tank?
If a certain number is divided by 7, the remainder is 3. What is the remainder when the same number is divided by 14?
A car travels a certain distance at a speed of 60 km/h. If the same distance is traveled at a speed 20 km/h slower, how much extra time will it take to cover the distance?
If set P = {1, 2, 3} and set Q = {2, 3, 4}, what is the union of sets P and Q?
A clock strikes once at 1 o'clock, twice at 2 o'clock, and so on. How many times will it strike between 1 pm and 6 pm?
If x^2 + y^2 = 25 and xy = 6, what is the value of x + y?
A train crosses a signal pole in 12 seconds at a speed of 80 km/h. What is the length of the train in meters?
If a rectangle has a length that is 3 cm more than twice its width, and the perimeter of the rectangle is 30 cm, what is the width of the rectangle?
A company offers a discount of 15% on a product initially priced at $200. If a customer also has a coupon for an additional 10% off, what is the final price of the product?
If set A = {a, b, c} and set B = {a, c, d}, what is the symmetric difference of sets A and B?
